title: Pharrell, Lil Wayne to Headline Doodles NFT Animated Film
description: Doodles film “Dullsville and the Doodleverse” will feature music from Pharrell Williams and other major musicians.

title: Bitkraft launches $275M gaming fund bringing total managed assets to $1B
description:
The company’s latest investment round is its largest to date.

Bitkraft Ventures, a global investment platform for gaming and media projects, recently announced the launch of a $275 million investment round. Once completed, the added projects will reportedly bring the company’s total assets under management to around $1 billion. 

The company’s previous rounds included investments in notable companies such as blockchain developer Jungle and Eve Online creator CCP. Its second funding round, dubbed Venture II, largely focused on web3 and blockchain games.

The latest round will go towards early-stage gaming projects. Dealstreet Asia also reports that at least 15% of the funds have been earmarked for projects in the Asian sector.

Read more

title: Why is Bitcoin price stuck?
description:
Bitcoin price has been stuck in a choppy range for more than two weeks. Cointelegraph explains why.

Bitcoin (BTC) has spent over two weeks trading in a $10,000 price range as new all-time highs remain elusive. 

Data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView shows that BTC has been fluctuating between $62,800 and $71,860 for nearly two weeks, suggesting indecisiveness among traders about the next direction the price might take.

Let’s look at the reasons why BTC price remains stuck today.

Read more
